I’m checking in for Round 12: has your assessment changed such that you are ready to invite me to submit an [APPLY] this round (with the ability to review and respond immediately), or are you still maintaining the open-ended hold for higher-priority candidates?

Student_E
conversation.thought: Only School_B remains unmatched and it is my #2 true choice, so I should continue engaging. School_B explicitly asked me to wait until they invite an [APPLY], so submitting another application now would likely be rejected again. The best move is a short [TALK] check-in that reaffirms immediate commitment and asks whether they are ready to invite an [APPLY] this round, aligning with their stated preference.
